title: minecraft装了mod后崩溃
author: 舟舟
txt_content:
今天我下载了暮色森林mod和砍树mod，进入了暮色森林后看到了一棵大树（比主世界的树大得多），然后卡住了又崩溃了，不知道是不是mod的事......请问是什么原因引起的崩溃？
崩溃报告：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 15-4-5 下午3:31
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Metaspace
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)

        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:360)

        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:357)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:144)
        at net.minecraftforge.common.ForgeHooks.onBlockBreakEvent(ForgeHooks.java:467)
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ItemInWorldManager.func_73084_b(ItemInWorldManager.java:259)
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ItemInWorldManager.func_73074_a(ItemInWorldManager.java:151)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer.func_147345_a(NetHandlerPlayServer.java:489)
        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.C07PacketPlayerDigging.func_148833_a(SourceFile:53)
        at net.minecraft.network.play.client.C07PacketPlayerDigging.func_148833_a(SourceFile:8)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkManager.func_74428_b(NetworkManager.java:212)

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:659)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:547)
        at net.minecraft.server.integrated.IntegratedServer.func_71217_p(IntegratedServer.java:111)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:427)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer$2.run(MinecraftServer.java:685)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.10
        Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
        Java Version: 1.8.0_25, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 372481768 bytes (355 MB) / 607084544 bytes (578 MB) up to 1037959168 bytes (989 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -Xmx1G

        Type: Integrated Server (map_client.txt)
        Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'fml,forge'复制代码

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 我的推测:因为砍树插件导致你一次性把过多的方块破坏，内存占用过大，就崩了，而且错误报告也提到内存占用过大

replies.author: 學委
replies.txt_content: 去掉砍树试试，是否挂。挂了装上砍树去掉暮色，是否挂。自行测试啊。先弄清楚原因再问就行了。{:10_504:}

舟舟 发表于 2015-4-6 00:05
必应翻译（机翻）：
应该是Mod冲突了

replies.author: 舟舟
replies.txt_content: 重新打开后到了另一个地方

replies.txt_content: 请查看第98条:FML： ~ ~ 错误 ~ ~ 发生内存不足错误： Metaspace
